name: neo-one
author: Alex DiCarlo <alexdicarlo@gmail.com>
description: NEOâ€¢ONE is a suite of tools and frameworks for developing dapps on the NEO blockchain.

scripts.tsc: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=3072" tsc && tsc -p packages/neo-one-smart-contract && tsc -p packages/neo-one-smart-contract-lib && tsc -p packages/neo-one-smart-contract-lib/src/__data__/contracts && tsc -p packages/neo-one-smart-contract-compiler/src/__data__/contracts && tsc -p packages/neo-one-server-plugin-project/src/__data__/ico/one/contracts
scripts.nit:scripts: yarn run nit:scripts:ts && yarn run nit:scripts:js
scripts.nit: yarn run nit:source && yarn run nit:scripts
scripts.prettier:scripts: yarn run prettier:scripts:ts && yarn run prettier:scripts:js
scripts.prettier:all: yarn run prettier:source && yarn run prettier:scripts
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:ts && yarn run lint:scripts
scripts.website:start-static: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=6144" TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig/tsconfig.es2017.cjs.json yarn run react-static start
scripts.website:start:dev: concurrently -n 'preview, testRunner, server, static' --kill-others-on-fail "yarn website:start-preview" "yarn website:start-testRunner" "yarn website:start-server" "yarn website:start-static"
scripts.website:start-workers-prod: cross-env NEO_ONE_CACHE=true NEO_ONE_PROD=true yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle workers
scripts.website:start-overlay-prod: cross-env NEO_ONE_CACHE=true NEO_ONE_PROD=true yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle overlay
scripts.website:start-tools-prod: cross-env NEO_ONE_CACHE=true NEO_ONE_PROD=true yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle tools
scripts.website:start-preview-prod: cross-env NEO_ONE_CACHE=true NEO_ONE_PROD=true yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle preview && yarn run serve dist/preview -p 8080
scripts.website:start-testRunner-prod: cross-env NEO_ONE_CACHE=true NEO_ONE_PROD=true yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle testRunner && yarn run serve dist/testRunner -p 8081
scripts.website:start-server-prod: cross-env NEO_ONE_CACHE=true NEO_ONE_PROD=true yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --watch --bundle server
scripts.website:start-static-prod: rm -rf ./packages/neo-one-website/publicOut && cp -r ./dist/workers ./packages/neo-one-website/publicOut && cp -r ./packages/neo-one-website/public/* ./packages/neo-one-website/publicOut && cross-env NEO_ONE_STAGING=true NEO_ONE_CACHE=true NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=6144" TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig/tsconfig.es2017.cjs.json yarn run react-static build --staging && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=6144" TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig/tsconfig.es2017.cjs.json yarn run serve packages/neo-one-website/dist -p 3000
scripts.website:start:prod: concurrently -n 'preview, testRunner, server, static' --kill-others-on-fail "yarn website:start-preview-prod" "yarn website:start-testRunner-prod" "yarn website:start-server-prod" "yarn website:start-static-prod"
scripts.website:stage: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=6144" TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig/tsconfig.es2017.cjs.json yarn run react-static build --staging
scripts.website:serve: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=6144" TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig/tsconfig.es2017.cjs.json yarn run serve packages/neo-one-website/dist -p 3000
scripts.website:build-static: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=6144" TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig/tsconfig.es2017.cjs.json yarn run react-static build
scripts.website:deploy-static: rm -rf ./dist && yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle tools && yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle workers && yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle overlay && rm -rf ./packages/neo-one-website/publicOut && cp -r ./dist/workers ./packages/neo-one-website/publicOut && cp -r ./packages/neo-one-website/public/* ./packages/neo-one-website/publicOut && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=6144" TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig/tsconfig.es2017.cjs.json yarn run react-static build && sh ./scripts/rm-cruft && cp ./scripts/website/now/static.now.json ./packages/neo-one-website/dist/now.json && cd packages/neo-one-website/dist && now --target production
scripts.website:deploy-testRunner: rm -rf ./dist && yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle tools && yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle workers && yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle testRunner && cp ./scripts/website/now/testRunner.now.json ./dist/testRunner/now.json && cd dist/testRunner && now --target production
scripts.website:deploy-preview: rm -rf ./dist && yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle tools && yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle overlay && yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle preview && cp -r ./dist/overlay/* ./dist/preview && cp ./scripts/website/now/preview.now.json ./dist/preview/now.json && cd dist/preview && now --target production
scripts.website:deploy-server: rm -rf ./dist && yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle server && cp ./scripts/website/now/server.now.json ./dist/server/now.json && cd dist/server && now --target production
scripts.website:deploy:all: yarn run website:deploy-static && yarn run website:deploy-testRunner && yarn run website:deploy-preview && yarn run website:deploy-server
scripts.compile:developer-tools-frame: cross-env NEO_ONE_DIST=true yarn run ts-node ./scripts/website/compile --bundle tools

hooks.pre-commit: lint-staged && echo "Executing tsc..." && yarn run tsc-fast
